00038 class  ActiveChannel : public BBItem
00039 {
00040     BBITEM_METAINFO(BBItem);
00041 
00042 protected:
00044     unsigned channel;
00045     
00046 public:
00047     
00049     ActiveChannel(unsigned c=0) : BBItem(), channel(c) {
00050     };
00051 
00053     int getActiveChannel() const  {
00054         return channel;
00055     }
00056     
00058     void setActiveChannel(unsigned c) {
00059         channel = c;
00060     }
00061     
00063     std::string info() const {
00064         std::ostringstream ost;
00065         ost << "Active channel is " << channel;
00066         return ost.str();
00067     }
